suite.name: Swipe

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to the given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/guides/caps/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | No | alias |

kw.doc: Logs and returns the entire html source of the current page or frame.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Text
kw.doc: Clicks the text identified by ``text``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Text
kw.doc: Clicks the text identified by ``text``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Element Location
kw.doc: Returns the location of the element with the ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Swipe
kw.doc: Swipes from one point to another point, for an optional ``duration``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Does Not Contain
kw.doc: Waits until the ``text`` disappears from the current page.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.
